Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.locale

Class Locale

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.locale.Locale
public class Locale extends Object
A locale constructed from a LocaleLanguage and an optional LocaleRegion. Provides a unique path to localized resources for this locale with path(LocaleLanguage).
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Constructor Summary

    Locale(LocaleRegion region, @NotNull Collection<LocaleLanguage> languages)
    Constructs a locale for a given region with a collection of languages.

  • Constructor Details

    • Locale

      public Locale(LocaleRegion region, @NotNull @NotNull Collection<LocaleLanguage> languages)
      Constructs a locale for a given region with a collection of languages. The first language in the collection is considered the "primary" language for the locale
      Parameters:
      region - The region
      languages - The languages spoken in this locale

    • path

      public StringPath path(LocaleLanguage language)
      Produces a path of the form "locales/[language-name](/[region-name])?". This path can be used when loading localized resources.
      Parameters:
      language - The name of the language
      Returns:
      A relative path of the given type for this locale

    • primaryLanguage

      public LocaleLanguage primaryLanguage()
      Returns the primary language for this locale

    • region

      public LocaleRegion region()
      Returns any region for this locale, or null if the locale is relevant to the whole world
